overview:
Mind Corporation is a creative digital agency, based in central London, but also with a satellite office in Oslo, where we work with our Scandinavian clients.

The principals, Andrew Robinson and Madeleine Reissiger , have between them, over 35 years experience in web design and multimedia, as well as branding and corporate identity.

Mindcorpâ€™s strength is its ability to realise highly creative web and branding projects with very short lead times and on budget. Because we are small, we are therefore efficient.

We deliver web, branding and campaign projects that have soul. Our clientsâ€™ websites are key to their strategy. We help them create digital campaigns that deliver fantastic ROI on their marketing spend.
